name: relax
description: an implementation of Overveld's relaxation of geometric constraints

scripts.build-min: browserify src/main.js -s Relax -o dist/_relax.js && uglifyjs dist/_relax.js -o dist/relax.min.js && rm dist/_relax.js
scripts.build: npm run build-debug && npm run build-min

author: Alex Warth <alexwarth@gmail.com> (http://tinlizzie.org/~awarth)
